title: LeBron James Says That He’ll Again Take Time Off This Season If He Needs To Rest
text:
LeBron James Says That He’ll Again Take Time Off This Season If He Needs To Rest 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
ESPN’s Dave McMenamin reports that LeBron James practiced on Sunday for the first time since receiving an anti-inflamatory injection in hi... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
